com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features

Interface FeatureAutoConfigurable.FeatureAutoConfigurationListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Feature.FeatureListener
    Enclosing class:
    FeatureAutoConfigurable

    public static interface FeatureAutoConfigurable.FeatureAutoConfigurationListener
extends Feature.FeatureListener
    extend the Feature.FeatureListener with the callback used for notify the configuration status

        void onAutoConfigurationStatusChanged(FeatureAutoConfigurable f,
                                      int status)
        notify that the process of configuration has a new state
        Parameters:
        f - feature that change its configuration status
        status - new calibration status when reach 100 the configuration is completed

      • onConfigurationFinished

        void onConfigurationFinished(FeatureAutoConfigurable f,
                             int status)
        The configuration process is done or stopped by the user
        Parameters:
        f - feature that finish its configuration process
        status - final configuration status: -1 if there was an error, otherwise is a % with the configuration goodness
